hello: Hi, I am Azarte Bot. Be creative!
text: I can offer you different textual alternatives:
microtale: I chose this microtale from my database:
definition: I found this definition in my fictional dictionary
abstract: I summarized a text for you:
poem: Here is a random poem for you:
number: I rolled a dice and got:
error: Something went wrong... I am so sorry!
language2: Note that I don't store any persistent data from you. If somebody restarts me I will forget your preference. In that case, be patient and send me /language again.
language3: I will try to speak in english now...
help: Check the command list. I am a trial and error fan...
